rotten.translation[0].definitions[0].def: badly decayed and no longer good to use
rotten.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: Some of the wood was completely rotten.
The apples went rotten very quickly.
rotten.translation[0].definitions[2].def: if someone is rotten, they are unpleasant, unkind, or dishonest
rotten.translation[0].definitions[2].exa: Why are you being so rotten?
rotten.translation[0].definitions[3].exa: I don’t want your rotten money!
